product_name: Sierra Designs Mobile Mummy 600 3-Season Sleeping Bag - Women's
long_description: Shaped for a woman, this 3-season treated-down sleeping bag is designed to move with you so you can sleep in any position you like. Then wear it as a jacket until the morning sun warms the day.
short_description: Shaped for a woman, this 3-season treated-down sleeping bag is designed to move with you so you can sleep in any position you like. Then wear it as a jacket until the morning sun warms the day.
